name: Confirmation Modal when Guest Access is disabled

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Confirmation Modal when Guest Access is disabled
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Login as sysadmin and navigate to System Console -> Guest Access page.
  2. Ensure Guest Access is enabled and saved.
  3. Set Enable Guest Access to false and check if confirmation modal is displayed
  4. Click Save and ensure Guest Access feature is disabled when user clicks on Invite People on the main chat screen.
inline.expectedResult:
• A confirmation modal with text "Disabling guest access will revoke all current Guest Account sessions. Guests will no longer be able to login and new guests cannot be invited into Mattermost. Guest users will be marked as inactive in user lists. Enabling this feature will not reinstate previous guest accounts."
  • Option to invite guest users should not be displayed

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Confirmation Modal when Guest feature is disabled — MM-18443
